resources.string: "Begin date must be less than end date"
"One category or more must be checked"
"No articles containing your search were found"
"Here you will find the three main categories of New York Times articles, Top Stories, Most Popular and Business. Tap on a tab to access it directly."
"You can also access the different categories through this menu."
"To read an article tap on the one that interests you."
"This icon allows you to search through New York Times articles."
"To do a search enter keywords and one or more categories (required). To narrow your search you can enter search dates."
"This icon gives you access to the notification settings, help (this presentation), and about."

"To receive notifications, enter keywords, a category or more and put the switch on. If you have done a search before, your search is predefined in notification, you just have to activate the switch. Notifications are made once a day."
"This app was made by e.bertaut as part of the Android OpenClassroom AD training."
